title: Bought Legendary skin, wheres my random skin?
body:
So I thought if we bought a 1820 skin or higher we unlocked another skin or am I just crazy? I am not seeing any other skins being unlocked. Is it just a bug for the time or is it something I should put in a ticket for?

EDIT:
Dang it... is this only going on starting the 23rd?

replies.body:
Yeah the free mystery gift for Legendary skin starts on the 23rd. 

You probably should of re-read everything.

Hey Sniper00299,

As lightdragoon88 mentioned, this event doesn't begin until the 23rd. If you have refund tokens, you can refund the skin and wait for the Legendary Snowball to begin!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 


Ok...I think we hijack this topic long enough.
it's a bug you can submit a ticket but did you actively buy a lg skin while ignoring the bug "!" at the top of the client?
It only says the gifting of a mystery skin not the purchase
oh i misunderstand i believe the snowball event does not start until the 23rd
